config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The MAX_HEIGHT configuration option is used to limit the height of an image according to the hints provided. If the image's height exceeds the specified maximum height, it will be resized to fit within the constraints.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The MAX_HEIGHT configuration is triggered whenever the system processes an image and needs to determine its size. The frequency of triggering depends on how often images are processed in the system.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the MAX_HEIGHT configuration option is that it ensures images do not exceed a certain height, which can help in maintaining consistency and preventing oversized images from affecting the layout or performance of the system.
